00009 #import "ASINetworkQueue.h"
00010 #import "ASIHTTPRequest.h"
00011 
00012 // Private stuff
00013 @interface ASINetworkQueue ()
00014         @property (assign) int requestsCount;
00015         @property (assign) unsigned long long uploadProgressBytes;
00016         @property (assign) unsigned long long uploadProgressTotalBytes;
00017         @property (assign) unsigned long long downloadProgressBytes;
00018         @property (assign) unsigned long long downloadProgressTotalBytes;
00019 @end
00020 
00021 @implementation ASINetworkQueue
00022 
00023 - (id)init
00024 {
00025         self = [super init];
00026         [self setShouldCancelAllRequestsOnFailure:YES];
00027         [self setMaxConcurrentOperationCount:4];
00028         [self setSuspended:YES];
00029         
00030         return self;
00031 }
00032 
00033 + (id)queue
00034 {
00035         return [[[self alloc] init] autorelease];
00036 }
00037 
00038 - (void)dealloc
00039 {
00040         //We need to clear the queue on any requests that haven't got around to cleaning up yet, as otherwise they'll try to let us know if something goes wrong, and we'll be long gone by then
00041         for (ASIHTTPRequest *request in [self operations]) {
00042                 [request setQueue:nil];
00043         }
00044         [userInfo release];
00045         [super dealloc];
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (BOOL)isNetworkActive
00049 {
00050         return ([self requestsCount] > 0 && ![self isSuspended]);
00051 }
00052 
00053 - (void)updateNetworkActivityIndicator
00054 {
00055 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00056         [[UIApplication sharedApplication] setNetworkActivityIndicatorVisible:[self isNetworkActive]];
00057 #endif
00058 }
00059 
00060 - (void)setSuspended:(BOOL)suspend
00061 {
00062         [super setSuspended:suspend];
00063         [self updateNetworkActivityIndicator];
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 - (void)go
00068 {
00069         if (![self showAccurateProgress]) {
00070                 if ([self downloadProgressDelegate]) {
00071                         [self incrementDownloadSizeBy:[self requestsCount]];
00072                 }
00073                 if ([self uploadProgressDelegate]) {
00074                         [self incrementUploadSizeBy:[self requestsCount]];
00075                 }               
00076         }
00077         [self setSuspended:NO];
00078 }
00079 
00080 - (void)cancelAllOperations
00081 {
00082         [self setRequestsCount:0];
00083         [self setUploadProgressBytes:0];
00084         [self setUploadProgressTotalBytes:0];
00085         [self setDownloadProgressBytes:0];
00086         [self setDownloadProgressTotalBytes:0];
00087         [super cancelAllOperations];
00088         [self updateNetworkActivityIndicator];
00089 }
00090 
00091 - (void)setUploadProgressDelegate:(id)newDelegate
00092 {
00093         uploadProgressDelegate = newDelegate;
00094         
00095         // If the uploadProgressDelegate is an NSProgressIndicator, we set it's MaxValue to 1.0 so we can treat it similarly to UIProgressViews
00096         SEL selector = @selector(setMaxValue:);
00097         if ([[self uploadProgressDelegate] respondsToSelector:selector]) {
00098                 double max = 1.0;
00099                 NSMethodSignature *signature = [[[self uploadProgressDelegate] class] instanceMethodSignatureForSelector:selector];
00100                 NSInvocation *invocation = [NSInvocation invocationWithMethodSignature:signature];
00101                 [invocation setSelector:selector];
00102                 [invocation setArgument:&max atIndex:2];
00103                 [invocation invokeWithTarget:[self uploadProgressDelegate]];
00104         }       
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 - (void)setDownloadProgressDelegate:(id)newDelegate
00109 {
00110         downloadProgressDelegate = newDelegate;
00111         
00112         // If the downloadProgressDelegate is an NSProgressIndicator, we set it's MaxValue to 1.0 so we can treat it similarly to UIProgressViews
00113         SEL selector = @selector(setMaxValue:);
00114         if ([[self downloadProgressDelegate] respondsToSelector:selector]) {
00115                 double max = 1.0;
00116                 NSMethodSignature *signature = [[[self downloadProgressDelegate] class] instanceMethodSignatureForSelector:selector];
00117                 NSInvocation *invocation = [NSInvocation invocationWithMethodSignature:signature];
00118                 [invocation setSelector:@selector(setMaxValue:)];
00119                 [invocation setArgument:&max atIndex:2];
00120                 [invocation invokeWithTarget:[self downloadProgressDelegate]];
00121         }       
00122 }
00123 
00124 - (void)addHEADOperation:(NSOperation *)operation
00125 {
00126         if ([operation isKindOfClass:[ASIHTTPRequest class]]) {
00127                 
00128                 ASIHTTPRequest *request = (ASIHTTPRequest *)operation;
00129                 [request setRequestMethod:@"HEAD"];
00130                 [request setQueuePriority:10];
00131                 [request setShowAccurateProgress:YES];
00132                 [request setQueue:self];
00133                 
00134                 // Important - we are calling NSOperation's add method - we don't want to add this as a normal request!
00135                 [super addOperation:request];
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00139 // Only add ASIHTTPRequests to this queue!!
00140 - (void)addOperation:(NSOperation *)operation
00141 {
00142         if (![operation isKindOfClass:[ASIHTTPRequest class]]) {
00143                 [NSException raise:@"AttemptToAddInvalidRequest" format:@"Attempted to add an object that was not an ASIHTTPRequest to an ASINetworkQueue"];
00144         }
00145                 
00146         [self setRequestsCount:[self requestsCount]+1];
00147         
00148         ASIHTTPRequest *request = (ASIHTTPRequest *)operation;
00149         
00150         if ([self showAccurateProgress]) {
00151                 
00152                 // If this is a GET request and we want accurate progress, perform a HEAD request first to get the content-length
00153                 if ([[request requestMethod] isEqualToString:@"GET"]) {
00154                         ASIHTTPRequest *HEADRequest = [request HEADRequest];
00155                         [self addHEADOperation:HEADRequest];
00156                         
00157                         //Tell the request not to reset the progress indicator when it gets a content-length, as we will get the length from the HEAD request
00158                         [request setShouldResetProgressIndicators:NO];
00159                         
00160                         [request addDependency:HEADRequest];
00161                 
00162                 // If we want to track uploading for this request accurately, we need to add the size of the post content to the total
00163                 } else if (uploadProgressDelegate) {
00164                         [request buildPostBody];
00165                         [self setUploadProgressTotalBytes:[self uploadProgressTotalBytes]+[request postLength]];
00166                 }
00167         }
00168         [request setShowAccurateProgress:[self showAccurateProgress]];
00169 
00170         
00171         [request setQueue:self];
00172         [super addOperation:request];
00173         [self updateNetworkActivityIndicator];
00174 
00175 }
00176 
00177 - (void)requestDidFail:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00178 {
00179         [self setRequestsCount:[self requestsCount]-1];
00180         [self updateNetworkActivityIndicator];
00181         if ([self requestDidFailSelector]) {
00182                 [[self delegate] performSelector:[self requestDidFailSelector] withObject:request];
00183         }
00184         if ([self shouldCancelAllRequestsOnFailure] && [self requestsCount] > 0) {
00185                 [self cancelAllOperations];
00186         }
00187         if ([self requestsCount] == 0) {
00188                 if ([self queueDidFinishSelector]) {
00189                         [[self delegate] performSelector:[self queueDidFinishSelector] withObject:self];
00190                 }
00191         }
00192 }
00193 
00194 - (void)requestDidFinish:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00195 {
00196         [self setRequestsCount:[self requestsCount]-1];
00197         [self updateNetworkActivityIndicator];
00198         if ([self requestDidFinishSelector]) {
00199                 [[self delegate] performSelector:[self requestDidFinishSelector] withObject:request];
00200         }
00201         if ([self requestsCount] == 0) {
00202                 if ([self queueDidFinishSelector]) {
00203                         [[self delegate] performSelector:[self queueDidFinishSelector] withObject:self];
00204                 }
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 - (void)setUploadBufferSize:(unsigned long long)bytes
00210 {
00211         if (![self uploadProgressDelegate]) {
00212                 return;
00213         }
00214         [self setUploadProgressTotalBytes:[self uploadProgressTotalBytes] - bytes];
00215         [self incrementUploadProgressBy:0];
00216 }
00217 
00218 - (void)incrementUploadSizeBy:(unsigned long long)bytes
00219 {
00220         if (![self uploadProgressDelegate]) {
00221                 return;
00222         }
00223         [self setUploadProgressTotalBytes:[self uploadProgressTotalBytes] + bytes];
00224         [self incrementUploadProgressBy:0];
00225 }
00226 
00227 - (void)decrementUploadProgressBy:(unsigned long long)bytes
00228 {
00229         if (![self uploadProgressDelegate] || [self uploadProgressTotalBytes] == 0) {
00230                 return;
00231         }
00232         [self setUploadProgressBytes:[self uploadProgressBytes] - bytes];
00233         
00234         
00235         double progress = ([self uploadProgressBytes]*1.0)/([self uploadProgressTotalBytes]*1.0);
00236         [ASIHTTPRequest setProgress:progress forProgressIndicator:[self uploadProgressDelegate]];
00237 }
00238 
00239 
00240 - (void)incrementUploadProgressBy:(unsigned long long)bytes
00241 {
00242         if (![self uploadProgressDelegate] || [self uploadProgressTotalBytes] == 0) {
00243                 return;
00244         }
00245         [self setUploadProgressBytes:[self uploadProgressBytes] + bytes];
00246         
00247         double progress;
00248         //Workaround for an issue with converting a long to a double on iPhone OS 2.2.1 with a base SDK >= 3.0
00249         if ([ASIHTTPRequest isiPhoneOS2]) {
00250                 progress = [[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedLongLong:[self uploadProgressBytes]] doubleValue]/[[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedLongLong:[self uploadProgressTotalBytes]] doubleValue]; 
00251         } else {
00252                 progress = ([self uploadProgressBytes]*1.0)/([self uploadProgressTotalBytes]*1.0);
00253         }
00254         [ASIHTTPRequest setProgress:progress forProgressIndicator:[self uploadProgressDelegate]];
00255 
00256 }
00257 
00258 - (void)incrementDownloadSizeBy:(unsigned long long)bytes
00259 {
00260         if (![self downloadProgressDelegate]) {
00261                 return;
00262         }
00263         [self setDownloadProgressTotalBytes:[self downloadProgressTotalBytes] + bytes];
00264         [self incrementDownloadProgressBy:0];
00265 }
00266 
00267 - (void)incrementDownloadProgressBy:(unsigned long long)bytes
00268 {
00269         if (![self downloadProgressDelegate] || [self downloadProgressTotalBytes] == 0) {
00270                 return;
00271         }
00272         [self setDownloadProgressBytes:[self downloadProgressBytes] + bytes];
00273         
00274         double progress;
00275         //Workaround for an issue with converting a long to a double on iPhone OS 2.2.1 with a base SDK >= 3.0
00276         if ([ASIHTTPRequest isiPhoneOS2]) {
00277                 progress = [[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedLongLong:[self downloadProgressBytes]] doubleValue]/[[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedLongLong:[self downloadProgressTotalBytes]] doubleValue]; 
00278         } else {
00279                 progress = ([self downloadProgressBytes]*1.0)/([self downloadProgressTotalBytes]*1.0);
00280         }
00281         [ASIHTTPRequest setProgress:progress forProgressIndicator:[self downloadProgressDelegate]];
00282 }
00283 
00284 
00285 // Since this queue takes over as the delegate for all requests it contains, it should forward authorisation requests to its own delegate
00286 - (void)authenticationNeededForRequest:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00287 {
00288         if ([[self delegate] respondsToSelector:@selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
00289                 [[self delegate] performSelector:@selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:) withObject:request];
00290         }
00291 }
00292 
00293 - (void)proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00294 {
00295         if ([[self delegate] respondsToSelector:@selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
00296                 [[self delegate] performSelector:@selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:) withObject:request];
00297         }
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 - (BOOL)respondsToSelector:(SEL)selector
00302 {
00303         if (selector == @selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:)) {
00304                 if ([[self delegate] respondsToSelector:@selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
00305                         return YES;
00306                 }
00307                 return NO;
00308         } else if (selector == @selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:)) {
00309                 if ([[self delegate] respondsToSelector:@selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
00310                         return YES;
00311                 }
00312                 return NO;
00313         }
00314         return [super respondsToSelector:selector];
00315 }

00320 @synthesize uploadProgressTotalBytes;

00327 @synthesize requestDidFailSelector;

00331 @synthesize userInfo;
